edu.ncsu.dre.data
Interface Artifact

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
TextArtifact
public interface Artifact
extends java.io.Serializable

Artifact is the general term for all DRE inputs that can be acquired and used by an application (or by other components of DRE).

Most applications will not need to deal with this abstract Artifact interface. DRE Developers who need to introduce new types of Artifacts, however, will need to implement this interface.

Author:
Santthosh Babu Selvadurai
